CustomField.description:
Used only for Data migration and replicated Enorica Sample order as External ID
It will store the C4C Order Number for Migrated data: a. S4 (non-replicated) Sample order, b. CRM Samples c. Enorica Samples
For S4 (replicated) sample order - it will be empty as Data migration of Replicated S4 Sample Order data to Salesforce is via interface
CustomField.label: Order DM External ID
